login(String, String) - Method in class TeamOrange.instantmessenger.controllers.LoginController
This is called by AccountScreen when the onLoginEvent occurs attempts to login with the given username and password if successfull, self data is saved to AppContacts, contacts are retreived and saved into AppContacts, screen is changed to the home screen if it fails then an exception will be thrown and an alert will be raised.
login(String, String) - Method in interface TeamOrange.instantmessenger.lambda.LoginEvent
